name: Saeed Ghadessi
text: Fantastic Pizza and Salads.... I am a huge fan of their cauliflower crust which I washing tastes better than the traditional crust.  There is plenty of free parking in the third street mall.  Can get a bit crowded on Wednesday and Saturday when Santa Monica Farmers Market is in the neighboring streets.  $$

name: Christopher B
text: My fav location for tasty Pizza. the place has an awesome feel to it. food is like a restaurant in jacksonville i loved.

name: K Andersen
text: Tried this place in the past with my friend and I am addicted ever since. I love the good ambience and flavorful food and beverages. 5 stars from me.

name: Ben Miskie
text: Had a decent experience, servers were friendly and nice, had the rib eye steak, cooked decently. Not an awesome cut off steak, somewhat thin, but still pretty good. Had the grilled asparagus and it too was cooked very nicely. If the cut off steak was a bit thicker, this would have been a 5 star experience.

name: John Lockard
text: Amazing pizza! Amazing soup! Great atmosphere! Highly recommend!

name: Luora Gomanaz
text: food is delicious, in any of their locations, but unfortunately the waiters are running thin. Very happy waiters and servers, everyone is great, but there arent enough of them.. hire hire more.  Had to wait 10-15 min AFTER giving my CC to charge for meal to get it back..

name: Amy J. Delevingne
text: I had a great breakfast! Caesar salad with a mushroom-sausage-pizza, and with coffee. The coffee was freshly brewed, and perfect. Like McDonald's, it's not to strong nor to weak. I was refilled, before I even noticed the cup was running …More

name: Kelly Au
text: Amazing food and service! We went on a Monday night so it wasn't super busy and got seated at the booths right away. The server offered us complementary bread as well. Pizzas were tasty, wished that we also had room to try the pastas and other dishes!

name: Eloisa Gould
text: i would surely recommend this dining experience To everyone who would like to spend some money for outstanding food.

name: ayde mon
text: man oh man - theyre Chinese cauliflower are amaziiiiing.. you will not be disappointed. Of course, the service was good, but deliciousness all the way

name: Wade Ridsdale
text: Atmosphere, even in a covid-19 laden enviornment was up to snuff. The beer helped.

name: Allen M
text: None of any dishes stand out and the salad quality is like supermarket cold fridge stored 8 hrs ago made taste. Would never come back. The decor in this location is bad too

name: Clara Baggett
text: Great service and the food was extremely fresh and tasty. I highly recommend their Cali Club pizza, it was delicious. And the cauliflower crust? Oh my goodness, to die for.

name: Dallon Ebmeyer
text: My first time visiting any California pizza kitchen restaurant and it wasn't a very good experience.  We were seated by the hostess, our waiter never came so the hostess ended up bringing us bread and taking our orders 10 minutes later. The …More

name: Kent Hargrave
text: When I'm in Santa Monica I often times come here and I am never disappointed.   They have added cauliflower crust when I live.

name: Mike Mackintosh
text: The mixed drinks were nice but didn’t get me buzzed enough to forget that the waitress forgot about us. Many tables were empty and the mobile orders were quiet. There’s no excuse for this treatment. The food was good though, as expected.

name: Wesley Rackley
text: Food is that of a California pizza kitchen. But things to look at in Santa Monica due to location.

name: Elyas Drini
text: Very clean and servers are supper nice.

name: Álvaro Paricio
text: Really good for the price, and the fish tacos are delicious!

name: Harry Irvine
text:
Great customer service at this location, food was excellent and fresh.

My server was very nice to me and my co workers. Thank you for the amazing food …More

name: Leanne Gillingham
text: Very friendly staff and nice interior. The menu includes a range of food and the waiters are happy to answer any questions you have. The menu is not too expensive which is good and portion sizes are also good. Would recommend!

name: Fethullah Ayyıldız
text: I would give 10 stars!!  Thanks Brittany !

name: Johnathon Kidd
text: Wonderful ambiance and friendly staff. Went here on Valentine's Day and place was clean despite the massive amount of people there

name: N Watson
text: Absolutely a place worth trying, the food is good and fresh, the pricing is fair and it is consistently clean here. Fantastic work.

name: Hunter Kay
text: Food is amazing! I have never been disappointed with the food. Staff can be extremely nice but sometimes forget to check on you. Waited 15 mins just to ask for a to go box. It’s not super cheap but not completely out of budget either.

name: Sa And
text: A little touristy but good

name: Misael Romero
text: I tried this place before with a friend and I am hooked since then. I loved the great vibes and delicious dishes and beverages. 5 stars from me.

name: Eduardo Aguilar-Montes
text: Came here with my girlfriend, we had an amazing experience! They had a clean and friendly environment where the waiter was capable of recommending delicious entrees. My favorite part was the specialty drink with cucumber. Love how this restaurant has something other restaurants don't offer. Will be coming back

name: roger hale
text: Delicious deserts.

name: Birgit Kraft
text: Always a wonderful choice!!! We had the BBQ chicken salad and the veggie pizza. Loved it as always. The location in Simi Valley Town Center Mall was my fave so far!!! Very nice waitress, too. Will come again!

name: Felisha Hutcheson
text: I think this is a great go to pizza joint if you are looking for something tasty.  It is my go to pizza join, when I am craving just good old pizza. Love it.

name: Gilberio Ramirez
text: Was a amazing family dinning experience Ireally love the Ribeye and fresh salads

name: Israel Roman
text: Delicious food, I love the Ribeye steak and the wild cut Halibut.

name: Alicia Miloradovich
text: They found us a good table for our party of 7. The food was so good. We all enjoyed the atmosphere. Service was good too

name: Arthur Weecks
text: seriously - BEST fish tacos in the world.  just come try it.  Open a location in seattle please!

name: Jonathan Knecht
text: Ordered the Hawaiian pizza. uggh! Pineapple was not ripe, not juicy and should not have been served.  its supposed to be sweet salty and a bit citrusy. Was neither.  The mushroom pizza was pretty good. Nice conbinations of mushrooms. Petite wedge was great, crispy iceberg with good blue cheeseburger! and real bacon bits. Bit pricey tho..

name: Cutlass Supreme
text: I had the fettuccine with shrimp,  omg. Mind blowing.  Pizza is great too.

name: Rene Medina
text: The shrimp scampi is ridiculously flavorful.The bolognese spegetti  just as good.The soups are definitely worth trying.

name: Harout Vartevanian
text: Showed up here late one night, about 1 hour before closing. I was there alone just wanted some pizza. I was seated when i overheard my waiter saying he didnt want my table. Not sure if this was because i was alone or maybe he assumed i dont …More

text: Great place!! My one comment is that the knifes don’t work well to cut pizza

text: Great service and tasty food. Only downfall is their pizza sizes. Small for the price.

name: Edward Pages
text: Consistently good fresh dishes. The chicken pizza is to die for n there salads rvawesomely fresh n tasty. My favorite is the thai salad. Kids menu helps with the budget as well. Chicken tenders n spaguetti r there favorites.

text: This place is horrible, I usually don't write reviews but this place took 10 dollars extra off my debit card when I went there! Literally just stole my money and I have the receipt  says it was 39 dollars they charged me 49! The food isn't …More

text: I'd highly recommend their BBQ Chicken Pizza

text: Had lunch and Sam was an easy going and responsive waiter, all good.

name: Anel Ramirez
text: Our server Penny was great and very attentive. The food was delicious. The Carne asada pizza was amazing and the steak was very tender. The pumpkin cheesecake was also very good.
